name: 王李吉
objective:
本課程內容包括：Android 作業系統概觀、Java 程式設計簡介、Android SDK 應用程式開發環境與模擬器建置、Android 專案建立與結構、Activity 元件、使用者介面設計與使用 XML 的方式、View 與 Layout、Widget 與使用者事件處理方法、Dialogs、Adapter 與 AdapterView、WebView、儲存媒介元件、多媒體撥放器元件、定位系統元件、Google Maps、加速感測器元件等等。
The topics included in this course will include: Android operating system overview, A brief introduction of Java, Android SDK development environment setup and the emulator, Android project creation, Activity, User interface design and XML, View and layout, Widget and event handling, Dialogs, Adapter and AdapterView, Webview, Storage, Mediaplayer, GPS, Google Maps, G-sensor, etc.
schedule:
Week  1: Overview of Android Apps and Android Studio  
Week  2: The First Android App
Week  3: User Interface/Layout Editor
Week  4: Activities/Intents
Week  5: Double_Tenth_National_Day
Week  6: Input Control/Menu/Picker 
Week  7: Menu/User Navigation
Week  8: RecyclerView
Week  9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Material Design 
Week 11: Adaptive Layouts/UI Testing 
Week 12: AsyncTask/AsyncTaskLoader/Internet
Week 13: Service/Broadcast Receivers
Week 14: Alarm Manager/JobScheduler
Week 15: Shared Preferences/App Settings
Week 16: SQLite/Room
Week 17: Project Demo
Week 18: Project Demo
